title: Customer Service Specialist
job_description:
Customer Service
Answer the customer's inquiry or question
Keep communication with customer to send spot quotation, make contract (Legal team will support for contract term & condition)
Arrange a meeting with customer when issue happens
Contact with new customer for meeting arrangement
2. Planning
Weekly report to General Director
Manage any spot report inquiry from BOD
Support HCM office business activities when needed
requirements:
University degree
4-5 years of working experience in the same position (Logistics company experience is preferred)
Language: Korean or English speaking
Good at Excel / PPT presentation
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Strong organizational and interpersonal skills
